description: Trap is sent each time when the synchronisation signal from GPS is lost or recovered.
Associated object is sent to indicate what is the status of the synchronisation after the change.

Summary.eval: ($v1 == 0) ? 'GPS synchronisation signal is lost' : 'GPS synchronisation signal is recovered'

description: Reports the status of synchronisation. True value indicates that synchronistation is present.
False value indicated lost synchronisation.
variables.name: AIRSPAN-BS-SOC-MIB::asMaxBsSocTrapStatusGpsSyncPresent

description: BS shall send this trap each time any of the critical to NMS operation
status parameters changes: SW version, IP and MAC addresses of SS itself
WiFi AP and EasyVoice.

event.Summary: NMS operation status current parameters: [SW version: $v3, IP address: $v5, MAC address: $v1, WiFi IP address: $v7, WiFi MAC address: $v8, EasyVoice IP address: $v10, EasyVoice MAC address: $v11]

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD AIRSPAN-BS-SOC-MIB::asMaxBsSocSsStatusChangedTrap AIRSPAN-BS-SOC-MIB::asMaxBsSocSsTrapSsMacAddress s EXAMPL AIRSPAN-BS-SOC-MIB::asMaxBsSocSsHwRevision i 9999 AIRSPAN-BS-SOC-MIB::asMaxBsSocSsSwVersion s EXAMPLE AIRSPAN-BS-SOC-MIB::asMaxBsSocSsIpAddrType i 0 AIRSPAN-BS-SOC-MIB::asMaxBsSocSsIpAddress s EXAMPLE AIRSPAN-BS-SOC-MIB::asMaxBsSocSsWiFiApIpAddrType i 0 AIRSPAN-BS-SOC-MIB::asMaxBsSocSsWiFiApIpAddress s EXAMPLE AIRSPAN-BS-SOC-MIB::asMaxBsSocSsWiFiApMacAddress s EXAMPL AIRSPAN-BS-SOC-MIB::asMaxBsSocSsEasyVoiceIpAddrType i 0 AIRSPAN-BS-SOC-MIB::asMaxBsSocSsEasyVoiceIpAddress s EXAMPLE AIRSPAN-BS-SOC-MIB::asMaxBsSocSsEasyVoiceMacAddress s EXAMPL

description: SS MAC address defintion used as atrap object.
variables.name: AIRSPAN-BS-SOC-MIB::asMaxBsSocSsTrapSsMacAddress

description: SS Hardware revision reported using custom TLV type 2 of REG-RSP.
variables.name: AIRSPAN-BS-SOC-MIB::asMaxBsSocSsHwRevision

description: SW version SS is currently running, reported using custom TLV type 3 of REG-RSP.
BS shall send a trap asMaxBsSocReportedSsStatusChanged on each change
in the value of this object.
variables.name: AIRSPAN-BS-SOC-MIB::asMaxBsSocSsSwVersion

description: The type of InetAddress used by asMaxBsSocSsIpAddress. Typically it refers to IPv4
but is defined in fully flexible way to satisfy SNMP MIB guidelines.
variables.name: AIRSPAN-BS-SOC-MIB::asMaxBsSocSsIpAddrType

description: IP address of SS management stack,
reported using custom TLV type 2.4 of CNFG-RSP.
When address hasn't been reported yet the object shall read 0xFFFFFFFF.
BS shall send a trap asMaxBsSocReportedSsStatusChanged on each change
in the value of this object.
variables.name: AIRSPAN-BS-SOC-MIB::asMaxBsSocSsIpAddress

description: The type of InetAddress used by asMaxBsSocSsWiFiApIpAddress. Typically it refers to IPv4
but is defined in fully flexible way to satisfy SNMP MIB guidelines.
variables.name: AIRSPAN-BS-SOC-MIB::asMaxBsSocSsWiFiApIpAddrType

description: IP address of SS integrated WiFi AP,
reported using custom TLV type 2.5 of CNFG-RSP.
When address hasn't been reported yet the object shall read 0xFFFFFFFF.
BS shall send a trap asMaxBsSocReportedSsStatusChanged on each change
in the value of this object.
variables.name: AIRSPAN-BS-SOC-MIB::asMaxBsSocSsWiFiApIpAddress

description: MAC Address of SS integrated WiFi AP,
reported using custom TLV type 2.7 of CNFG-RSP.
When address hasn't been reported yet the object shall read FF:FF:FF:FF:FF:FF.
BS shall send a trap asMaxBsSocReportedSsStatusChanged on each change
in the value of this object.
variables.name: AIRSPAN-BS-SOC-MIB::asMaxBsSocSsWiFiApMacAddress

description: The type of InetAddress used by asMaxBsSocSsEasyVoiceIpAddress. Typically it refers to IPv4
but is defined in fully flexible way to satisfy SNMP MIB guidelines.
variables.name: AIRSPAN-BS-SOC-MIB::asMaxBsSocSsEasyVoiceIpAddrType

description: IP address of SS integrated EasyVoice product (residential VoIP gateway),
reported using custom TLV type 2.6 of CNFG-RSP.
When address hasn't been reported yet the object shall read 0xFFFFFFFF.
BS shall send a trap asMaxBsSocReportedSsStatusChanged on each change
in the value of this object.
variables.name: AIRSPAN-BS-SOC-MIB::asMaxBsSocSsEasyVoiceIpAddress

description: MAC Address of SS integrated EasyVoice product (residential VoIP gateway),
reported using custom TLV type 2.8 of CNFG-RSP.
When address hasn't been reported yet the object shall read FF:FF:FF:FF:FF:FF.
BS shall send a trap asMaxBsSocReportedSsStatusChanged on each change
in the value of this object.
variables.name: AIRSPAN-BS-SOC-MIB::asMaxBsSocSsEasyVoiceMacAddress

description: Description.
SS MAC address defintion used as atrap object.
variables.name: AIRSPAN-BS-SOC-MIB::asMaxBsSocSsTrapSsMacAddress

description: An event sent by SS to BS. BS should send trap asMaxBsSocSsEventTrap
containing the definition of SS event.
variables.name: AIRSPAN-BS-SOC-MIB::asMaxBsSocSsTrapSsEvent

description: Defines the event trap for DFS system.
Some values of the event type may raise an alarm and some may clear (NMS specific).
For example dfsEventTypeUnableToTransmit value of asMaxBsSocTrapStatusDfsEventType
will raise an alarm.
A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: Object defines the type of change reported by DFS system.
Values dfsEventRadarDetected and dfsEventUnableToTransmit
can be used to raise an alarm.
Value dfsEventNewChannelSelected can be used to clear alarm.
Values dfsEventUnableToOperate2Channels, dfsEventUnableToOperate3Channels
are info.
variables.name: AIRSPAN-BS-SOC-MIB::asMaxBsSocTrapStatusDfsEventType

description: Object defines the channel number associated with asMaxBsSocTrapStatusDfsEventType.
In case where the channel is not selected the channelNumber=0.
variables.name: AIRSPAN-BS-SOC-MIB::asMaxBsSocTrapStatusDfsChannelNumber

description: Trap sent to indicate a change in the validity of the encryption licence certificate.

Summary.eval: ($v1 == 1) ? 'Licence certificate is invalid' : 'Licence certificate is valid'

description: Reports the invalidity or otherwise of the currently configured encryption licence.
Note: a value of TRUE indicates that the licence is INVALID; a value of FALSE that the licence is VALID.
In the absence of any configured encryption licence, this property shall report FALSE.
variables.name: AIRSPAN-BS-SOC-MIB::asMaxBsSocTrapStatusLicenceCertInvalid
